lead_paragraph: SHAW--Alan Milton, 85, of Basking Ridge, NJ, died at Morristown Medical Center, Sunday, March 6, 2016. Born July 23, 1930, son of Samuel and Mildred of Bradley Beach, NJ, Mr. Shaw graduated the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, and Harvard Law School. A member of the New York State Bar since 1959, he served in the U.S. Army, and at Skadden, Arps. Predeceased in 2013 by Margaret, his wife of 54 years, he is survived by his son Andrew who is affianced to Tamara Sand Lee, and grandsons Alan and Theodore Shaw; and by his daughter Adriane and her husband William A. Walsh, and granddaughters Margaret and Elizabeth Walsh. A memorial service will be held 11am Saturday, March 19, 2016 at Saint John on the Mountain, 379 Mount Harmony Road, Bernardsville, NJ 07924, (908) 766-2282. A luncheon will follow at the Morris County Golf Club, 36 Punch Bowl Rd., Morristown, NJ 07960, (973) 539-7200. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHAW, ALAN MILTON
